mapper.select:
SELECT `mat`.id AS tabId, `mat`.`name` AS tabPicture, '0' as isPaging FROM mm_advice_rel_tab_association `marta` LEFT JOIN mm_advice_tab `mat` ON `marta`.tab_id = `mat`.`id`
`marta`.`rel_id` = #{relId} AND `marta`.del_flag = 0 AND `mat`.del_flag = 0

SELECT `mat`.id AS tabId, `mat`.`name` AS tabPicture, '0' as isPaging FROM mm_advice_rel_tab_association `marta` LEFT JOIN mm_advice_tab `mat` ON `marta`.tab_id = `mat`.`id`
`marta`.`rel_id` = #{relId} AND `marta`.del_flag = 0 AND `mat`.del_flag = 0

SELECT `pg`.id AS goodsId, `pg`.name AS goodsName, `pg`.icon, `pg`.subtitle, `pg`.sales_volume, `pgs`.sell_price, `pgs`.line_price, ar.reduction_full_money, ar.reduction_post_money, GROUP_CONCAT(`pga`.name) as labels FROM mm_advice_rel_tab_things `martt` LEFT JOIN pm_goods pg ON pg.id = `martt`.`association_id` AND `martt`.`tab_id` = #{tabId} LEFT JOIN am_activity_rel_activity_goods `aarag` ON `aarag`.goods_id = pg.`id` LEFT JOIN am_reduced ar ON ar.id = `aarag`.`activity_id` LEFT JOIN pm_goods_sku `pgs` ON `pg`.id = `pgs`.goods_id LEFT JOIN pm_goods_rel_attribute_good pgrag ON pg.id = pgrag.`goods_good_id` LEFT JOIN pm_goods_attribute pga ON pgrag.goods_attribute_id = pga.`id`
`martt`.`tab_id` = #{tabId} AND `martt`.del_flag = 0 AND pg.`publish_status` = 1 AND `aarag`.`verify_status` = 3 AND `aarag`.`del_flag` = 0 AND ar.`del_flag` = 0 AND ar.enable = 1 AND ar.activity_end_time > NOW() AND `pgs`.del_flag = 0 AND `pgs`.id = ( SELECT temp.id FROM pm_goods_sku temp WHERE temp.goods_id = pg.id AND temp.del_flag = 0 ORDER BY sell_price LIMIT 1 ) AND pgrag.`del_flag` = 0 AND pga.`del_flag` = 0 AND pga.`enabled` = 1 AND pga.`type` = 5
GROUP BY pg.id,pgs.id,ar.id
ORDER BY pgs.sell_price ${sortWay.name}
ORDER BY pg.sales_volume ${sortWay.name}
ORDER BY pg.comprehensive_score DESC
limit 3

SELECT `pg`.id AS goodsId, `pg`.name AS goodsName, `pg`.icon, `pg`.subtitle, `pg`.sales_volume, `pgs`.sell_price, `pgs`.line_price, `ai`.discount_price_ratio FROM mm_advice_rel_tab_things `martt` LEFT JOIN pm_goods pg ON pg.id = `martt`.`association_id` AND `martt`.`tab_id` = #{tabId} LEFT JOIN am_activity_rel_activity_goods `aarag` ON `aarag`.goods_id = pg.`id` LEFT JOIN am_integrals ai ON ai.id = `aarag`.`activity_id` LEFT JOIN pm_goods_sku `pgs` ON `pg`.id = `pgs`.goods_id
`martt`.`tab_id` = #{tabId} AND `martt`.del_flag = 0 AND pg.`publish_status` = 1 AND `aarag`.`verify_status` = 3 AND `aarag`.`del_flag` = 0 AND ai.`del_flag` = 0 AND ai.enable = 1 AND ai.activity_end_time > NOW() AND `pgs`.del_flag = 0 AND `pgs`.id = ( SELECT temp.id FROM pm_goods_sku temp WHERE temp.goods_id = pg.id AND temp.del_flag = 0 ORDER BY sell_price LIMIT 1 )
ORDER BY pgs.sell_price ${sortWay.name}
ORDER BY pg.sales_volume ${sortWay.name}
ORDER BY pg.comprehensive_score DESC
ORDER BY pg.sales_volume DESC
limit 3

SELECT mars.id AS shuffling_id, mars.`cover_photo`, mars.advice_type, mars.detail_id, mars.html_detail FROM mm_advice_rel_shuffling mars WHERE rel_activity_group_id = #{relId} AND mars.del_flag = 0 AND mars.start_time < NOW() AND mars.end_time > NOW()

WITH RECURSIVE parentIds (id,parent_id, `name`, `level`) AS ( SELECT DISTINCT pgc.`id`, pgc.parent_id, pgc.name, pgc.level FROM am_reduced ar LEFT JOIN am_activity_rel_activity_goods aarag ON ar.id = aarag.`activity_id` AND ar.group_id = #{groupId} LEFT JOIN pm_goods pg ON pg.id = aarag.`goods_id` LEFT JOIN pm_goods_category pgc ON pg.goods_category_id = pgc.id
ar.group_id = #{groupId} AND ar.`del_flag` = 0 AND ar.enable = 1 AND ar.`activity_end_time` > NOW() AND ar.`activity_start_time` < NOW() AND aarag.`verify_status` = 3 AND aarag.`del_flag` = 0 AND pg.`publish_status` = 1
UNION ALL SELECT pgc.id, pgc.parent_id, pgc.name, pgc.level FROM parentIds AS temp LEFT JOIN pm_goods_category AS pgc ON temp.parent_id = pgc.id WHERE pgc.del_flag=0 ) SELECT DISTINCT id,`name` FROM parentIds WHERE `level` = 1

WITH RECURSIVE parentIds (id,parent_id, `name`, `level`) AS ( SELECT DISTINCT pgc.`id`, pgc.parent_id, pgc.name, pgc.`level` FROM am_integrals ai LEFT JOIN am_activity_rel_activity_goods aarag ON ai.id = aarag.`activity_id` AND ai.group_id = #{groupId} LEFT JOIN pm_goods pg ON pg.id = aarag.`goods_id` LEFT JOIN pm_goods_category pgc ON pg.goods_category_id = pgc.id
ai.group_id = #{groupId} AND ai.`del_flag` = 0 AND ai.enable = 1 AND ai.`activity_end_time` > NOW() AND ai.`activity_start_time` < NOW() AND aarag.`verify_status` = 3 AND aarag.`del_flag` = 0 AND pg.`publish_status` = 1
UNION ALL SELECT pgc.id,pgc.parent_id,pgc.name, pgc.level FROM parentIds AS temp LEFT JOIN pm_goods_category AS pgc ON temp.parent_id = pgc.id WHERE pgc.del_flag=0 ) SELECT DISTINCT id,`name` FROM parentIds WHERE `level` = 1

SELECT `mara`.id AS relId, `ssc`.id AS storeCategoryId, `ssc`.name AS storeCategoryName, `ssc`.icon AS storeCategoryIcon FROM sm_store_category `ssc` , mm_advice_rel_associaiton `mara` , mm_advice `ma` WHERE `ssc`.id = `mara`.`association_id` AND `mara`.`advice_id` = `ma`.id AND `ma`.location = #{location} AND `ma`.`enabled` = 1 AND `mara`.del_flag = 0 AND `ssc`.`enabled` = 1 AND `ssc`.`del_flag`= 0

SELECT * FROM ( SELECT pg.`icon` AS picture, aarag.`activity_end_time`, aargs.activity_price, pgs.sell_price, '' AS discount_price_ratio, '' AS reduction_full_money, '' AS reduction_post_money, '' AS groupNum, '3' AS `groupType` FROM am_activity_rel_activity_goods aarag LEFT JOIN pm_goods pg ON pg.id = aarag.`goods_id` LEFT JOIN am_activity_rel_goods_sku aargs ON aargs.rel_id = aarag.`id` LEFT JOIN pm_goods_sku pgs ON pgs.id = aargs.sku_id WHERE aarag.`activity_type` = 3 AND aarag.verify_status = 3 AND aarag.`del_flag` = 0 AND aarag.`activity_end_time` > NOW() AND aarag.`activity_start_time` < NOW() AND pg.`publish_status` = 1 AND pg.`del_flag` = 0 AND aargs.del_flag = 0 AND pgs.del_flag = 0 ORDER BY pgs.sell_price - aargs.activity_price DESC LIMIT 2 ) AS seckill UNION ALL SELECT * FROM ( SELECT pg.`icon` AS picture, '' AS `activity_end_time`, '' AS sellPrice, '' AS line_price, ai.discount_price_ratio, '' AS reduction_full_money, '' AS reduction_post_money, '' AS groupNum, '2' AS `groupType` FROM am_integrals ai LEFT JOIN am_activity_rel_activity_goods aarag ON ai.id = aarag.`activity_id` LEFT JOIN pm_goods pg ON pg.id = aarag.`goods_id` WHERE ai.del_flag = 0 AND ai.enable = 1 AND ai.`activity_end_time` > NOW() AND ai.`activity_start_time` < NOW() AND aarag.verify_status = 3 AND aarag.`del_flag` = 0 AND pg.`publish_status` = 1 AND pg.`del_flag` = 0 ORDER BY ai.discount_price_ratio,pg.sort DESC LIMIT 2 ) AS integrals UNION ALL SELECT * FROM ( SELECT pg.`icon` AS picture, '' AS `activity_end_time`, '' AS sellPrice, '' AS line_price, '' AS discount_price_ratio, ar.reduction_full_money, ar.reduction_post_money, '' AS groupNum, '1' AS groupType FROM am_reduced ar LEFT JOIN am_activity_rel_activity_goods aarag ON ar.id = aarag.`activity_id` LEFT JOIN pm_goods pg ON pg.id = aarag.`goods_id` WHERE ar.del_flag = 0 AND ar.enable = 1 AND ar.`activity_end_time` > NOW() AND ar.`activity_start_time` < NOW() AND aarag.verify_status = 3 AND aarag.`del_flag` = 0 AND pg.`publish_status` = 1 AND pg.`del_flag` = 0 ORDER BY (ar.reduction_full_money - ar.reduction_post_money),pg.sort ASC LIMIT 2 ) AS reduced UNION ALL SELECT * FROM ( SELECT pg.`icon` AS picture, aarag.`activity_end_time`, '' AS sellPrice, '' AS line_price, '' AS discount_price_ratio, '' AS reduction_full_money, '' AS reduction_post_money, SUM(condition_num) AS groupNum, '4' AS `groupType` FROM am_activity_rel_activity_goods aarag LEFT JOIN pm_goods pg ON pg.id = aarag.`goods_id` LEFT JOIN am_spell_group_main asgm ON aarag.id = asgm.rel_id WHERE aarag.`activity_type` = 4 AND aarag.verify_status = 3 AND aarag.`del_flag` = 0 AND aarag.`activity_end_time` > NOW() AND aarag.`activity_start_time` < NOW() AND pg.`publish_status` = 1 AND pg.`del_flag` = 0 AND asgm.status = 3 GROUP BY aarag.id ORDER BY groupNum DESC LIMIT 1 ) AS spellGroup

SELECT `mic`.id , `mic`.name FROM mm_information_category `mic` , mm_advice_rel_associaiton `mara` , mm_advice `ma` WHERE `mic`.id = `mara`.`association_id` AND `mara`.`advice_id` = `ma`.id AND `ma`.location = #{location} AND `ma`.`enabled` = 1 AND `mara`.del_flag = 0 AND `mic`.`enabled` = 1 AND `mic`.`del_flag`= 0

SELECT `mat`.id AS tabId, `mat`.`name` AS tabName FROM mm_advice_rel_tab_association `marta`, mm_advice_tab `mat` WHERE `marta`.tab_id = `mat`.`id` AND `marta`.`rel_id` = #{relId} AND `marta`.del_flag = 0 AND `mat`.del_flag = 0

SELECT `ss`.id AS storeId, `ss`.logo_image AS logoImage, `ss`.name AS storeName, `ss`.store_describe AS storeDescribe, (EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM um_user_favorites uuf WHERE uuf.favorites_id = ss.id AND uuf.`type` = '店铺' AND uuf.user_id = #{userId} AND uuf.del_flag = 0) ) AS is_focus, ( SELECT GROUP_CONCAT(`ssl`.name) FROM sm_store_label `ssl` , sm_store_rel_label ssrl WHERE `ssrl`.store_label_id = `ssl`.id AND `ssrl`.store_id = ss.`id` AND `ssl`.del_flag = 0 ) AS storeLabels FROM mm_advice_rel_tab_things `martt`, sm_store `ss` WHERE `martt`.`association_id` = `ss`.id AND `martt`.`tab_id` = #{tabId} AND `martt`.del_flag = 0 AND `ss`.enabled = 1

SELECT `ss`.id AS storeId, `ss`.logo_image AS logoImage, `ss`.name AS storeName, `ss`.background_image AS backgroundImage, `ss`.store_describe AS storeDescribe, (EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM um_user_favorites uuf WHERE uuf.favorites_id = ss.id AND uuf.`type` = '店铺' AND uuf.user_id = #{userId} AND uuf.del_flag = 0) ) AS is_focus, ( SELECT GROUP_CONCAT(`ssl`.name) FROM sm_store_label `ssl` , sm_store_rel_label ssrl WHERE `ssrl`.store_label_id = `ssl`.id AND `ssrl`.store_id = ss.`id` AND `ssl`.del_flag = 0 ) AS storeLabels FROM sm_store `ss` WHERE `ss`.enabled = 1 ORDER BY `ss`.create_time DESC

select a.id as advice_id,a.name as advice_name,a.picture as advice_picture,a.location,b.id as shuffling_id,b.cover_photo, b.advice_type,b.detail_id,b.html_detail from mm_advice a left join mm_advice_rel_shuffling b on a.id = b.advice_id and b.del_flag = 0 and b.rel_tab_brand_id is null and b.rel_category_id is null where a.del_flag = 0 and a.enabled = 1 and (b.start_time <= NOW() AND b.end_time >= NOW() OR location = 'BOTTOM_SHUFFLING' OR location = 'PERSONAL_CENTER' OR location = 'BAIHUO' OR location = 'TOP_UP_ENTRY' OR location = 'YOUXUAN' OR location = 'SHOUYE_ZHUTI' OR location = 'SALE' OR location = 'SHOUYE_YOUPIN' OR location = 'STORE_DETAIL' OR location = 'COUPON' OR location = 'EXPERIENCE_PACKAGE' OR location = 'INVITATION') and a.location not in ("YOUPIN_INSIDE_SHUFFLING","YOUDIAN_INSIDE_SHUFFLING","SALE_INSIDE_SHUFFLING", "YOUXUAN_INSIDE_SHUFFLING","BAIHUO_INSIDE_SHUFFLING","information_recommended","PERSONAL_CENTER_MIDDLE_SHUFFLING","FIRST_CATEGORY_DETAIL")

select b.id as shuffling_id,b.cover_photo,b.advice_type,b.detail_id,b.html_detail from mm_advice a,mm_advice_rel_shuffling b where a.del_flag = 0 and b.del_flag = 0 and a.enabled = 1 and a.id = b.advice_id and a.location = #{location} and b.start_time <= now() and b.end_time >= now()

select b.id as goods_id,b.icon as picture,b.name as goods_name,b.sales_volume,max(c.line_price) as line_price,MIN(c.sell_price) as sell_price from mm_advice_rel_tab_things a,pm_goods b,pm_goods_sku c where a.del_flag = 0 and b.del_flag = 0 and c.del_flag = 0 and a.tab_id = #{tabId} and a.association_id = b.id and b.id = c.goods_id group by b.id

select e.name as label_name from pm_goods a,pm_goods_rel_attribute_good d,pm_goods_attribute e where a.id = #{goodsId} and a.id = d.goods_good_id and d.goods_attribute_id = e.id and e.type = 5 and a.del_flag = 0 and d.del_flag = 0 and e.del_flag = 0

select b.id as brand_id,b.name as brand_name,b.logo_image as brand_logo,b.subtitle,b.collection_num from mm_advice_rel_tab_things a,pm_goods_attribute b where a.tab_id = #{tabId} and a.association_id = b.id and a.del_flag =0 and b.del_flag = 0

select b.id as goods_id,b.name as goods_name,b.icon as picture,b.activity_cost_rate, b.profits_rate,b.sales_volume,d.sell_price as sell_price,d.line_price,b.forward_num,b.collection_num from pm_goods b,pm_goods_sku d where match(name) against(#{name}) and b.publish_status = 1 and b.del_flag = 0 and d.del_flag =0 and d.goods_id=b.id and d.id = (SELECT id from pm_goods_sku d2 where d2.`goods_id` = b.id and d2.del_flag =0 and d2.sell_price = (SELECT Min(d1.sell_price) FROM pm_goods_sku d1 WHERE d1.`goods_id` = b.id and d1.del_flag =0 LIMIT 1) limit 1) limit 30;

select c.name as condition_name,b.id as goods_id,b.name as goods_name,b.icon as picture,b.subtitle,b.activity_cost_rate, b.profits_rate,b.sales_volume,d.sell_price as sell_price,d.line_price,b.forward_num,b.collection_num from mm_advice_rel_tab_things a,pm_goods b,pm_goods_sku d,mm_advice_tab c where b.publish_status = 1 and a.del_flag = 0 and b.del_flag = 0 and c.del_flag =0 and d.del_flag =0 and a.tab_id = #{conditionId} and a.association_id = b.id and d.goods_id=b.id and c.id = a.tab_id and d.id = (SELECT id from pm_goods_sku d2 where d2.`goods_id` = b.id and d2.del_flag =0 and d2.sell_price = (SELECT Min(d1.sell_price) FROM pm_goods_sku d1 WHERE d1.`goods_id` = b.id and d1.del_flag =0 LIMIT 1) limit 1) order by b.sales_volume desc limit 6;

select b.id as goods_id,b.name as goods_name,b.icon as picture,b.activity_cost_rate, b.profits_rate,b.sales_volume,d.sell_price as sell_price,d.line_price,b.forward_num,b.collection_num from pm_goods b,pm_goods_sku d where b.publish_status = 1 and b.del_flag = 0 and d.del_flag =0 and d.goods_id=b.id and d.id = (SELECT id from pm_goods_sku d2 where d2.`goods_id` = b.id and d2.del_flag =0 and d2.sell_price = (SELECT Min(d1.sell_price) FROM pm_goods_sku d1 WHERE d1.`goods_id` = b.id and d1.del_flag =0 LIMIT 1) limit 1) order by b.comprehensive_score desc limit 30;
